<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/ubl2.1/config/software"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



CONFIGURAR SOFTWARE

- Requiere un token de autorizacion.
- El campo id, corresponde al id de software que entrega la DIAN.
- El campo pin, corresponde al pin del software propio.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"82bf0c5e-0117-434d-9471-8a5ee58ae682"},"pin":{"type":"integer","example":12345}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
